author: Naushad K. Cherrayil
title: Why telcos in UAE don’t favour opening of WhatsApp and FaceTime amid Covid-19
description: Blocking VoIP apps can protect some of the revenues from voice, especially lucrative segments such as international calls and roaming, analyst says
content:
Residents in the UAE have been urging telecom operators to further ease restrictions on free video and voice calls over the internet (VoIP) such as WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, Skype and Apples FaceTime due to Coronavirus outbreak.
